title: The Grey (2012) 1080p iTunes
description:
The Grey (2012) 117 min

DESCRIPTION:
After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step. (with audio commentary from writer/director Joe Carnahan, editors Roger Barton and Jason Hellman)

SPECS IN BRIEF:
M4V file for iTunes/iDevices
V: 1920x800 23.98 fps h.264 @ 5700 Kbps
A: 160 Kbps 2.0 AAC & 384 Kbps 5.1 AC-3 / 96 Kbps AAC 2.0 (commentary)
S: English & English SDH
C: 20 (Numbered)

SOURCE:
The.Grey.2011.1080p.BluRay.DTS.x264-ESiR

PLAYBACK:
Encoded & tagged for iTunes (10.6 or later) and Apple devices that can handle *1080p HD* video. Playback is confirmed for:
  1. 2012 iPad
  2. 2012 AppleTV
  3. 2011 iPad 2 with 5.1 software or later
  4. 2011 iPhone 4S
  5. 2010 AppleTV with 5.0 software or later (will output file as 720p)

A FEW WORDS ABOUT THIS ENCODE:
Because its INCREDIBLY grainy, this film doesn't look good even at 5700 Kbps. Chapter 09, from 47:20 to 51:10, has bad pixelation that doesn't go away even at max (10,000Kbps) settings. I'm mentioning this because this was requested and I want to manage expectations. So please, NO WHINING.
